name: ANTRAVITY 2: INVERSED
description:
[NOTE: AV2 is still in Early Access - Many features and content are being added frequently]

• Many modes: Open World, Stunt Arena, Big Jump, Levels, Online, and of course the classic Bomb Mode from ANTRAVITY 1.

• 38 highly detailed vehicles: Improved vehicles from ANTRAVITY 1 along with brand new vehicles

• Advanced vehicle physics: New realistic system that has everything from  gear shifting to anti-rolling, along with improved weight and wheels. 

• Cross-Play: ANTRAVITY 2 is planned to be available for both Android and PC, cross-play feature allows everyone to play together.

• Next-Gen Graphics: High graphics that you can enjoy on any device whether it's a PC or smartphone.

• Customized Vehicles: Every vehicle is special whether it has widebody, stance look, or a tuned engine.
